betterquesting:10.desc:8:
After you get the resonator, you'll be able to freely manipulate meta-dynamic energy. 

First, you'll need to make a MetaDynamic Drawer, which draws meta-dynamic energy from a fissure and releases it into a designated device (right-click on it using the MetaDynamic Resonator, then right-click on the device that needs meta-dynamic energy). 

You can also make a Meta-Dynamic Disperser, which will then receive meta-dynamic energy and disperse it to surrounding machines that have a need for meta-dynamic energy, eliminating the need to make multiple meta-dynamic drawers. 

The Meta-Dynamic Relay is similar to TC4's Magic Repeater, so when the Meta-Dynamic device and the Drawing Instrument are too far apart, you can have it act as a relay, and it's cheaper. 

The next section will explain how to use and store meta-kinetic energy.
betterquesting:10.name:8: draw on the energy of the Yuan dynasty (1279-1368)
